description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Bedd Gelert: its facts, fairies, & folk-lore. (Based upon the articles by Mr. William Jones in Y Brython.) ... With translations of poetry by the Rev. H. E. Lewis and an introduction by Principal J. Rhys" Author: JENKINS, David Erwyd. Contributor: JONES, William - of Beddgelert Contributor: LEWIS, Howell Elvet. Contributor: RHYS, John - Right Hon. Sir, Principal of Jesus College, Oxford Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10369.e.23." Page: 210 Place of Publishing: Portmadoc Date of Publishing: 1899 Publisher: Llewelyn Jenkins Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001861749 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
